HousePricePrediction package¶

Submodules¶

HousePricePrediction.ingest_data module¶

A module for downloading data and saving into data folder.

HousePricePrediction.ingest_data.fetch_housing_data(housing_url, housing_path)¶

Download the data from passed url

Parameters:

  • housing_url (str) – url where data is present

  • housing_path (str) – folder where data is to saved

HousePricePrediction.ingest_data.main()¶

HousePricePrediction.predict module¶

HousePricePrediction.score module¶

HousePricePrediction.score.main()¶

HousePricePrediction.train module¶

A module to train the model.

The model can be trained with python train.py data model, where data model are cli input

HousePricePrediction.train.load_housing_data(housing_path: str) → DataFrame¶

load the data stored in data/raw folder

Parameters:

housing_path (str :) – url link where housing data in present

Return type:

pd.DataFrame

HousePricePrediction.train.main()¶

Split data into train and test and perform model training

When this function is called it will create folder named processed folder and then save train and test data.Then model training will happen next and the trained model will be saved in the folder named model

Module contents¶

HousePricePrediction

HousePricePrediction is a complete package for mplementing House Price Prediction

Tamlep
